TABLE.NAME: topomojo
TABLE.COMMENT: each record is one topomojo activity

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the topomojo activity, pulled from topomojo

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the topomojo activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: intro text format.

FIELD.NAME: workspaceid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the guid of the workspace in topomojo

FIELD.NAME: embed
FIELD.COMMENT: Embed the markdown in the activity instead of displaying a link to topomojo

FIELD.NAME: clock
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to display the clock to the user

FIELD.NAME: extendevent
FIELD.COMMENT: Allows the user to request an additional hour

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz opens. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz closes. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The total that the quiz is scaled out of.

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: The grading method for grading. This applies to grading multiple attempts

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this topomojo activity was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this topomojo activity was modified

FIELD.NAME: reviewattempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. This is a bit field, decoded by the mod_topomojo_display_options class. It is formed by ORing together the constants defined there.

FIELD.NAME: reviewcorrectness
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewmarks
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewspecificfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewgeneralfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewrightanswer
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewoverallfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewmanualcomment
FIELD.COMMENT: The comment that instructors can add when grading an attempt

FIELD.NAME: questionorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The question order for the quiz

FIELD.NAME: shuffleanswers
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the parts of the question should be shuffled, in those question types that support it.

FIELD.NAME: preferredbehaviour
FIELD.COMMENT: The behaviour to ask questions to use.

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: The time limit for lab attempts, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: importchallenge
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not moodle should automatically pull challenge questions from topomojo and add them to the quiz inside of the lab

FIELD.NAME: endlab
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether quiz submission should end TopoMojo lab.

FIELD.NAME: variant
FIELD.COMMENT: The variant of the lab. Defaults to 0.

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: topomojo grades table to hold grades for individual users

FIELD.NAME: topomojoid
FIELD.COMMENT: the topomojo id

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid that this grade is for

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade for this user, for this topomojo lab

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time created/modified for this grade

KEY.NAME: topomojoid_fk
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key referencing the topomojo table.

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: The topomojo attempts table to hold attempts for students

FIELD.NAME: topomojoid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the topomojo lab for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: workspaceid
FIELD.COMMENT: The workspace guid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: eventid
FIELD.COMMENT: The gamespace guid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress', 'overdue', 'finished' or 'abandoned'.

FIELD.NAME: score
FIELD.COMMENT: The score for this attempt

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: The expirationDate of the event

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt began

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt ended

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time this attempt was modified

FIELD.NAME: launchpointurl
FIELD.COMMENT: The launchpointurl for this gamespace

FIELD.NAME: layout
FIELD.COMMENT: the layout for this particular attempt

FIELD.NAME: questionusageid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the question_usage that holds the details of the the question_attempts that make up this quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: variant
FIELD.COMMENT: The variant of the lab. Defaults to 0.

KEY.NAME: questionusageid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key referencing the question_usages table.

TABLE.NAME: topomojo_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: table to hold question information for topomojo quizzes

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary key for the table, auto-incremented.

FIELD.NAME: topomojoid
FIELD.COMMENT: The topomojo this question instance is associated with.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question ID for the question in the question engine.

FIELD.NAME: points
FIELD.COMMENT: How many points this question contributes to quiz.sumgrades.

KEY.NAME: fk_topomojoid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key referencing the topomojo table.

KEY.NAME: fk_questionid
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key referencing the question table.
